name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Unique identifier for the substance.

name: $status
desc: Returns: A code to indicate if the substance is actively used.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code to indicate if the substance is actively used.

name: $category
desc: Returns: A code that classifies the general type of substance.  This is used  for searching, sorting and display purposes.

name: $addcategory
desc: A code that classifies the general type of substance.  This is used  for searching, sorting and display purposes.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A code that classifies the general type of substance.  This is used  for searching, sorting and display purposes.

name: $code
desc: Returns: A code (or set of codes) that identify this substance.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code (or set of codes) that identify this substance.

name: $description
desc: Returns: A description of the substance - its appearance, handling requirements, and other usage notes.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A description of the substance - its appearance, handling requirements, and other usage notes.

name: $instance
desc: Returns: Substance may be used to describe a kind of substance, or a specific package/container of the substance: an instance.

name: $addinstance
desc: Substance may be used to describe a kind of substance, or a specific package/container of the substance: an instance.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Substance may be used to describe a kind of substance, or a specific package/container of the substance: an instance.

name: $ingredient
desc: Returns: A substance can be composed of other substances.

name: $addingredient
desc: A substance can be composed of other substances.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A substance can be composed of other substances.
